
# Extended Boolean Model

This project is learn how to make Information Retrieval from scratch, using PyQT5 as GUI to make a facinating application.



## Modul Include

 - Boolean Query
 - TF-IDF
 - Jaccard
 - N-Gram
 - Cosine Distance
 - Extended Boolean Model


## Documentation

![Image of project Extended Boolean Model](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/80300827/297908383-82956fa4-8c95-4ea2-92a7-7b852436f9ac.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..x5ixYr829Pofn1W8GPjiQLMzU-FHFcz9PmgbJXYDm48)


## Python Libraries

To run this project, you will need to add several libraries in Python.

- `PyQT5` (Create GUI)
- `NLTK` (Preprocessing Text)
- `Sastrawi` (Preprocessing Text in Indonesia)
- `Sklearn` (Run Machine Learning)
- `Numpy` (Making Matrix)
- `Pandas` (Read the dataframe)
